page.title: 20THE SCHOOL
page.content: Langford Budville Primary School is now the only school in our area,it was built in 1851 of red sandstone. When it started it had roughly 80 children attending it and they were divide into two classes.The head teacher lived in a cottage ajoining the school and had a garden where the infants class is now.There are at present 35 children at the school. We have a large playground where we play Netball,Rounders and P.E.. The boys play football and cricket on the triangle an open grass area near the common. Once a week we go swimming at the sports centre. The school curriculum conists of Mathematics ,Language,Topic,Spelling,Handwriting ,Science,Art and Craft and reading.We have a computer, a colour television and a radio as well as many other resourses and a great number of books.
